programHeader.title: A Bootcamp Of Excellence
programHeader.description: Support aspiring developers, data scientist, and tech enthusiast through comprehensive bootcamps and training programs that transforms careers.

phases.title: Phase 1: Virtual Learning
phases.description: Master fundamentals through live sessions, interactive coding challenges, and peer collaboration in our virtual environment.

phases.title: Phase 2: Physical Learning
phases.description: Hands-on in-person training with industry experts, real-world projects, and collaborative workshops.

phases.title: Phase 3: The Mentorship Phase
phases.description: One-on-one guidance from senior professionals, portfolio building, interview prep, and job placement support.

objectives.text: Build strong technical foundations in your chosen track
Develop problem-solving and critical thinking skills
Learn industry-standard tools and best practices
Complete real-world projects for your portfolio
Gain confidence through consistent practice and feedback

outcomes.text: Join a network of 1,000+ successful alumni

videoSection.title: Experience Future Clan Future Camp through our lens
videoSection.subtitle: Watch highlights of Future Camp through our lens

testimonials.name: Jerome Bell
testimonials.text: This bootcamp transformed my career. The hands-on approach and mentorship helped me land my dream job at Google. Highly recommend!

testimonials.name: Kristin Watson
testimonials.text: Less than 24h turn around. Easy communication. Did exactly as offered, all around a perfect experience.

testimonials.name: Annette Black
testimonials.text: The instructors are world-class and the curriculum is industry-relevant. I'm now working at WhatsApp thanks to this program.

testimonials.name: Jacob Jones
testimonials.text: Amazing attention to detail and very prompt delivery. Truly exceeded expectations.

testimonials.name: Cameron Williamson
testimonials.text: Incredible to work with, very professional and delivers top-quality work every time.

testimonials.name: Courtney Henry
testimonials.text: Great service, good communication, and the project came out even better than expected!

ctaBanner.title: Ready to Transform Your Career?
ctaBanner.description: Join thousands of successful graduates who have transformed their careers through our comprehensive bootcamp programs. Start your journey today!
